Madhavan, Sharman Joshi, Omi, Boman Irani.</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="520" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">"Rascal. Joker. Dreamer. Genius. You've never met a college student quite like 'Rancho.' From the moment he arrives at India's most prestigious university, Rancho's outlandish schemes turn the campus upside down-along with the lives of his two newfound best friends. Together, they make life miserable for 'Virus, ' the school's uptight and heartless dean. But when Rancho catches the eye of the dean's sexy daughter, Virus sets his sights on flunking out the 3 idiots, once and for all"--Container.</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="521" ind1="8" ind2=" "><subfield code="a">MPAA rating: PG-13; for thematic materials, some disturbing images and crude humor.</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="538" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">DVD ; NTSC, region 1 ; Dolby Digital 5.1 ; dual layer ; widescreen, 2.35:1 aspect ratio.</subfield></datafield><datafield tag="540" ind1=" " ind2=" "><subfield code="a">No public performance rights. all_text_timv: Three idiots India naf Beverly Hills, CA : Twentieth Century Fox, [2011] 1 videodisc (164 min.) : sound, color ; 4 3/4 in. two-dimensional moving image tdi rdacontent video v rdamedia videodisc vd rdacarrier Originally produced as a motion picture in 2009. Based on the novel Five Point Someone by Chetan Bhagat. Bonus features: Idiots in Ladakh (10 min.); Aal izz well (3 min.); 100% idiots (5 min.); making of Miss Idiot (4 min.). Director of photography, Muraleedharan C.K. ; editor, Rajkumar Hirani ; original music, Shantanu Moitra, Atul Raninga, Sanjay Wandrekar ; lyrics, Swanand Kirkire. Aamir Khan, Kareena Kapoor, R. Madhavan, Sharman Joshi, Omi, Boman Irani. "Rascal. Joker. Dreamer. Genius. You've never met a college student quite like 'Rancho.' From the moment he arrives at India's most prestigious university, Rancho's outlandish schemes turn the campus upside down-along with the lives of his two newfound best friends. Together, they make life miserable for 'Virus, ' the school's uptight and heartless dean. But when Rancho catches the eye of the dean's sexy daughter, Virus sets his sights on flunking out the 3 idiots, once and for all"--Container. No public performance rights.  Classroom instruction and home use permitted. Purchased with funds from the Mary Sullivan Barber and S. Walter Sweet Arts and Humanities Collections Endowment; 2013.
